text: Filippo Costa (born 21 May 1995) is an Italian footballer, who plays for Virtus Entella, on loan from Napoli. He is left-footed and plays as a left midfielder. ==Club career== Costa started his career in his native Veneto club Chievo. In July 2015 he was signed by English club Bournemouth. However, in January 2016 he returned to Chievo. In January 2017 he was loaned to SPAL with an option to buy. In June 2017 SPAL excised the option for €1 million transfer fee. On 13 July 2019, Costa signed to Napoli. On 15 July 2019, he joined Bari on loan until 30 June 2021.
